data.title: Oklahoma State University
data.meta_description: Delve into how various factors impact food availability, production, distribution, and consumption worldwide. Explore international cultures and foods while learning about the challenges and solutions to the global food crisis. Gain insights into our food systems and discover practical ways to create a more sustainable future. Join us in understanding these dynamics and working towards a healthier world.
data.text:
Food and the Human Environment

Delve into how various factors impact food availability, production, distribution, and consumption worldwide. Explore international cultures and foods while learning about the challenges and solutions to the global food crisis. Gain insights into our food systems and discover practical ways to create a more sustainable future. Join us in understanding these dynamics and working towards a healthier world. (fulfills I & S)

Program Highlights
